channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39984|2024-06-05T20:37:46.622Z -- hitachi -- eh-view
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer vulnerability in Hitachi EH-VIEW (KeypadDesigner) allows local attackers to potentially disclose information and execute arbitray code on affected EH-VIEW installations. User interaction is required to exploit the vulnerabilities in that the user must open a malicious file. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

item.title: CVE-2024-2493|2024-04-23T05:35:57.491Z -- hitachi -- hitachi%20ops%20center%20analyzer
item.description: Session Hijacking vulnerability in Hitachi Ops Center Analyzer.This issue affects Hitachi Ops Center Analyzer: from 10.0.0-00 before 11.0.1-00.
